summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Red Carpet Manicure Starter Kits
Review Date: 2020/07/27
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Color': 'RCM Essentials Starter Kit', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'UPC': '817248203854', 'Manufacturer': 'RC Red Carpet Manicure/ Zupishi'}
Review Text: I know gel polish has been around for quite some time but I actually switched from dip powder to gel. I do my own nails and just find dip to be messy and time consuming. I figured at this point all gel systems were the same, so I’ve been using a cheap brand. I came across this kit and definitely notice the difference in Red Carpet. It’s much better quality. Your gel polish will last 21 days if you follow the directions. Five stars from me and it’s a great value!
Review Title: Red Carpet... the difference in quality is noticeable!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AUGNORYE 13 Pcs Hair Cutting Scissors Kit, Professional Hair Barber Scissors Kit with Thinning Shears, Home Hair Shears for Women, Men, Kids
Review Date: 2020/08/03
Store: AUGNORYE
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'AUGNORYE', 'Included Components': 'Scissors', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel'}
Review Text: I was looking for a decent set of scissors to trim my daughters hair. This set exceeded my expectations. The Sheers have a nice weight to them, comfortable in your hands. The cuts are precise. The kit come with great accessories. All are useful, only complaint is the brush is cheaply made.
Review Title: Strudy scissors!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3 Pieces Messy Donut Chignons Hair Piece Scrunchies Synthetic Extensions Updo Hair Bun for Women Scrunchies Natural Black #1b
Review Date: 2020/08/08
Store: SHINYSHOW
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'UPC': '738630490242'}
Review Text: My hair is a 3/4 medium to dark brown with some red undertones. I went with the 1b natural black because the 4 was described as light brown. Light brown is usually a 5. I suggest you go with the number instead of relying on the description. This is still a good product and will match my hair when I first color it... it is always a bit darker. Unfortunately, I was not blessed with thick luscious hair so my buns are super thin (see pictures). This scrunchie is made of synthetic hair and easy to use. I only need to use one but it came with three buns. This is an added bonus because over time synthetic hair will become frizzy and tangled. Also with synthetic, you can not color it or use heat on it.
Review Title: Great to add umph! to your messy bun!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Dr. Denese SkinScience Essential Lipid Anti Aging Power Infusion Dry Oil - Skin Nutrients 97% Organic 100% Natural - Rejuvinating Blend with Amaranth & Resveratrol - Paraben-Free, Cruelty-Free - 2oz
Review Date: 2020/08/23
Store: Dr. Denese
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Dr. Denese', 'Item Form': 'Dr. Denese', 'Unit Count': '2.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.57 x 3.15 x 3.07 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '800166A', 'UPC': '811684022284', 'Manufacturer': 'Dr. Denese'}
Review Text: At 30 something, I wanted to start taking better care of my skin. I was excited to try this Infusion Oil. Many referred to this as the game changer. But sadly this wasn't a product for me. I still have combination and acne prone skin. The oil never soaked into my skin. It also caused me to break out. I gave it to my mother-in-law, she has dry patches. She loved this stuff. It worked perfectly for her. Her face felt refreshed and moisturized. She also has sensitive skin and has not had any irritation from this Infusion Oil.
Review Title: Not for combination skin type.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LANGE HAIR Extendé Conditioning Detangler Hair Spray - Paraben Free Leave-in Conditioner Spray, Detangles and Hydrates Hair, Moisture & Shine | 4OZ
Review Date: 2020/08/30
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Curly, Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Helps protect color and reinforces strands, leaving them strong and vibrant', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.4 x 1.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '793150592708'}
Review Text: I've tried a couple L'ange products with the sea salt spray being my favorite. I love this fortifying detangler as well! My hair is fine which means its fragile. I'm trying to grow it out about four more inches. My ends tend to get thin from breakage. I'm hoping this product helps prevent this. So far I notice my hair is breaking less when I brush it. It's a great detangler with a clean scent. It adds shine to my hair and there is less frizz.
Review Title: Another great L'ange product!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use
Review Date: 2020/08/30
Store: Keiby Citom
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'}
Review Text: I like to do my own nails. These emery boards are wonderful for removing glue and gel polish. The curved shape of the emery board is helpful when filing your nails and shaping nails. I love that these nail files are washable.
Review Title: Great for removing nail glue.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: invisibobble Sprunchie Spiral Hair Ring - True Black - Scrunchie Stylish Bracelet, Strong Elastic Grip Coil Accessories for Women - Gentle for Girls Teens and Thick Hair
Review Date: 2021/02/19
Store: invisibobble
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'invisibobble', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Item Weight': '2 Grams', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '2.83 x 2.8 x 0.87 inches; 0.07 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IB-SP-HP10001'}
Review Text: I have long, medium thick hair. This scrunchie did not work for me. My bun constantly fell down. I can use the spiral rings without the cloth, with no problems.
Review Title: Not for me.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Christmas Headbands for Women,Glitter headbands Sequence Red and Green,Holiday Costume Headwear Handmade Mouse Ears Hairband Hair Decorations for Girl Party Cosplay Favor Accessories
Review Date: 2021/02/25
Store: YanJie
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Occasion': 'Christmas, Party, Birthday, Thanksgiving', 'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Package Dimensions': '10.12 x 7.6 x 1.22 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '751300682099'}
Review Text: This headband is cute and adorable for any child; But not made very well. Poor quality. Started to come apart before even wearing the headband. The headband is comfortable and sit well in hair.
Review Title: Poor quality!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 3D Mask Bracket - Internal Support Holder Frame Nose Breathing Smoothly- Lipstick Protection Cool Mask Bracket - DIY Face Mask Accessories - 5Pcs (L-Adult)
Review Date: 2021/04/21
Store: Vedory
Product Description: ['❤-Outfits Set Include: 1 pack of 5 3D mask bracket (not including mask or cloth, etc.). ❤-Size: about 10*9*4.2cm / 3.9*3.51*1.64 inches, enough space for various masks. ❤-Unique design: designed to fit the face of the nose bridge, breathing more smoothly, breathable and not stuffy. ❤-Ideal Saver for Makeup - It makes the mask not to stick lipstick, protecting your perfect makeup from being messed up.If you wear glasses, 3D Inner Bracket can also prevent the lens from fogging because of more breathing space. ❤ 3D Inner Bracket also suitable for various ma-sks.Using double sided tape or thread to fasten the silicone frame onto the mask can make it work better.']
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.72 x 2.36 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '800914455053', 'Manufacturer': 'Vedory'}
Review Text: These are not the most comfortable to wear and it takes some getting used to. I do not hook them to my mask, I just let them rest on my face under my mask. They don’t help save my makeup but that is not what I use them for. I am a teacher and have a hybrid class (covid times). This means I am teaching in person and my remote students log on at certain times for lessons. So I wear this contraption for 30 minutes at a time. I teach pre k and my mask does not allow children to accurately hear me. I cannot take my mask of because I also have students in person. This bracket allows my young scholars to hear the important sounds during phonics and phonemic learning. It was difficult for my remote students to diffreintiate between sounds when segmenting words such as she, he, etc.
Review Title: Met my needs
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Green Tea Stick Mask ,Purifying Green Tea Clay Mask,Cleansing Mask for Face Oil Control,Green Solid Mask,Deep Clean Pores for All Skin Types Men Women
Review Date: 2021/07/10
Store: sefudun
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'sefudun', 'Item Form': 'Clay, Stick', 'Product Benefits': 'Cleansing', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 1.57 x 1.54 inches; 3.21 Ounces'}
Review Text: I seen so many ads for this green mask I had to try it. It did absolutely nothing! After using this mask my skin felt a little tightness. It was hard to remove the mask.
Review Title: Not worth it!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

It was difficult for my remote students to diffreintiate between sounds when segmenting words such as she, he, etc.

POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has expressed satisfaction with several products, particularly appreciating the noticeable difference in quality when using a higher-end nail kit, leading to longer-lasting results. The user enjoyed using a professional hair scissors kit, noting its sturdy weight and precision in cuts, alongside useful accessories. Detangling hair products contributed positively to their hair care routine, highlighting a reduction in breakage and improved shine. The synthetic hair scrunchies provided added volume for hairstyling, enhancing the user's experience. Moreover, the functionality of the 3D mask bracket was recognized for aiding communication in a teaching setting, demonstrating its utility.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Conversely, the user encountered some disappointments, particularly with products that did not meet expectations. One skin oil caused breakouts, indicating it may not be suitable for combination skin types, while a mask was criticized for being ineffective and difficult to remove. Quality issues arose with a headband that began to fall apart quickly, leading to dissatisfaction. Additionally, a hair accessory did not hold up as intended during use, which detracted from its overall effectiveness. These experiences reflect inconsistencies in quality and performance across various purchases.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping experiences showcase a mixed bag of results. On the positive side, they found high-quality products that delivered on promises, particularly in hair care and nail kits, enhancing their grooming routines. However, negative experiences with ineffective skincare and inferior quality items highlighted gaps in product performance, leading to frustration. The varied satisfaction levels demonstrate the importance of product reliability, as well as the need for thorough research prior to purchases, balancing the joy of good finds with the disappointment of faulty items.

target_interaction.title: Great for fine hair!
target_interaction.text: Having fine hair … I’ve wanted to try a halo for a long time. I want it for special occasions. Clip in extensions do not stay in my hair and they just fill heavy and uncomfortable. My hair is medium length below my shoulders. I got the dark brown halo to add volume not length. It is so easy to wear and blend. It’s light weight. The hair is very nice, make sure you take care of it. Using it for awhile it hasn’t gotten damaged or tangled. I’m especially surprised by how easy halos are to wear.
target_interaction.title_meta: Oreola Wire Hair Extensions Real Remy Human Hair with Invisible Miracle Wire One Piece Extension Chocolate Brown Color #3 16 Inch 100 Gram
features: Remy Human Hair--High quality original material makes our wire hair extensions no tangling, no shedding, no smelling.
Fast and Easy to Use-- No tape, no glue, no sew, you can install it by yourself within a few minutes. Adjust the size by tightening or loosening the elastic wire.
Invisible Wire Hair Extensions--If you don't need the clips, just take out them and just use the wire.
Perfect Color Matching--There are various of colors for your selection, so you can choose the nearest color to match your own hair.

Return or Exchange Service--We provide Quick Money-Back guarantee for every customer. If you are not satisfied with our products, please keep the hair in its original condition and feel free to contact us. Oreola will always provide you best service.
